pageContent: STIHL End-2-EndE-Commerce Services From global e-commerce strategy to the development of new digital sales platforms: diconium has created an online experience for B2B and B2C customers. Read more ENDRESS + HAUSER Search Engine Optimization Visible, accessible and authentic: Thanks to a holistic online marketing revision, the search engine visibility of strategically relevant websites has improved by 77% and the stay duration has increased. Read more KODAKALARIS Digital Fulfillment System Year after year, millions of orders run through the Kodak Digital Fulfilment System stably and reliably thanks to diconium. Read more MANN + HUMMEL Brand Strategy & Corporate Website From brand strategy to a corporate website: diconium has holistically repositioned the corporate brand of the world market leader and bundled the know-how of all MANN+HUMMEL brands on one platform for filtration. Read more BECHTLE Brand Platform with integrated shop A completely new brand appearance: diconium has bundled corporate content, services and store products on one platform, connected microservices and adapted the new approach for numerous countries. Read more TRUMPF Customer Experience Plattform One for all: By providing content, ordering and product research on a central platform, diconium enables a seamless customer experience for Trumpf customers - including a new store and numerous convenience features. Read more CREATING DIGITAL CHAMPIONS diconium is your partner for digital growth along the entire value chain. We build strategies, develop commerce platforms, and give you access to data-driven intelligence. Rooted in commerce, grown in digital transformation – diconium is just as integrated into the digital sales of STIHL as it is in the Volkswagen ID.4’s software, Bechtle’s brand platform or Coop’s and Trumpf’s online shops. We can guarantee this with more than 2,000 employees in interdisciplinary teams of consultants, data experts, and software developers across 14 locations in Europe, North America, and Asia. Contact us

WHAT WE DO? WE CREATE DIGITAL CHAMPIONS To achieve this, we build on three pillars that drive us forward and make each member of our team even stronger. RELEVANCE We're the game-changers of digital transformation, supporting trailblazers of the most important industries in mastering digitalization and making consumer behavior more sustainable. INDEPENDENCE We are independent in the way we think and act: We work on a global scale for market leaders and hidden champions, supported by the power of our parent company Volkswagen. EXCITEMENT Our employees are our greatest asset. Together we master technological challenges from various angles. With state-of-the-art tools and a corporate culture that strengthens our team spirit as much as our individual development. Our credo: one for all, all for one! In diverse, interdisciplinary teams with over 2,000 connected colleagues we work together in many ways from remotely to onsite in one of our worldwide offices in Europe, North America and Asia. But then again, are locations that important? Creativity knows no limits anyways. So we don't set any. Instead, we develop the environment in which you can create – in line with our core values courage, mindfulness, collaboration and impact. In other words: We want to be courageous, show mutual respect, work together as a team and achieve something great. Still nothing suitable for you? Mobility is on the verge of a revolution – and we deliver the most appropriate software and safety solutions. The goal is to fundamentally rethink the interaction between software and hardware in cars and pave the way for Volkswagen to become a software-driven automotive company. Together with CARIAD, we are developing VW.OS and the Volkswagen Automotive Cloud, a uniform software platform for all passenger car brands of Volkswagen. Our cyber security experts and penetration testers provide the foundation to protect these systems in the best possible way. We are a global digital company looking for talent from all over the world. Experience Developer First & support us in probably one of the most extensive digital projects in the German automotive industry! Learn more

GET INSIDE BIG DATA We are supporting your intellectual challenge by a cross-industry project portfolio in mobility, IoT, Industrial, Consumer, Financial and non-profit organizations. From scratch analytics and personalization to automation by process mining and further to highly developed neural networks, computer vision as well as natural language processing applications we love to support our clients end-to-end to become a data-driven organization. In addition, we will support you with one day per week to continuously push your data competence and your boundaries to the next level for you personally and of course also for us as an organization. Therefore, a clear personal development roadmap and a clear commitment is a crucial part of our self perception and our diconium values to achieve your personal goals collaboratively. Our in-house blog apply.data as well as the podcast and the blog #RewriteTech underline what these innovations can look like for our customers – on these platforms, employees from various departments have their say and give insights into their jobs and projects of the diconium group. And we continue to grow: More than 1,000 colleagues support our customers from thirteen locations worldwide. What unites us? The courage to break new ground, mutual respect, teamwork and the will to make a lasting change. diconium is a 100 percent subsidiary of the Volkswagen Group. Doesn't sound that bad, does it? Get to know our Service & Operations Team For over 25 years, we have been accompanying companies on this path as a partner with our entire expertise. End-to-end: from strategy, technology and data to organization and transformation. Our support and operations team is a specialized unit within the company. All employees are located in one of our offices worldwide. This unit is responsible for helping a company’s support team be more productive, work more effectively, and deliver better service to the customers. Our mission As a S&O team our main vision is to establish lean scalable support processes for platform customers, to enable low-risk releases and also identify & address bottlenecks. Who are we? As SRE we focus on bringing the software development view to the Service Management by defining Service Level Indicator (SLIs), Service Level Objectives (SLOs) and Service Level Agreements (SLAs) to reduce the MTTR (Mean Time to Resolve) and bringing more observability to the distributed systems, and also introducing Error budgets How do we work? The S&O team is structured across the global diconium group and brings all experts together remotely or on-site to share experience and knowledge. This enables diconium to translate the needs and requirements of its customers into the best possible solutions. 3 jobs available Service & Operations

JOIN US TO BUILD OUR SALESFORCE COMPETENCE CENTER! For over 25 years, we have been accompanying companies on this path as a partner with our entire expertise. End-to-end: from strategy, technology and data to organization and transformation. Our Salesforce Competence Center is a specialized unit within the company. All employees are located in one of our offices worldwide and are specialized experts focusing on different clouds. This unit ensures the exchange of experience and knowledge gained in various projects. With this approach, the company is well equipped to respond to the needs and requirements of customers and offer the best possible solutions. Our mission For over 25 years, we have made it our mission to create digital champions. While at that time we focused on digital transactions, today we map the entire customer journey and provide all the services necessary to create and optimise the digital business capabilities of our clients. At the same time, we put the end customer at the centre to provide them with an optimal and personalised experience at all touchpoints. Who are we We are a community for Salesforce enthusiasts to create a mutually supportive and positive learning environment where everyone has the opportunity to develop project and industry specific skills that in turn drive the growth of the Salesforce practice at diconium. How do we work? The Salesforce Competence Centre is structured across the global diconium group and brings all experts together remotely or on-site to share experience and knowledge. This enables diconium to translate the needs and requirements of its customers into the best possible solutions. 5 jobs available Salesforce

More about us The people & organization team is located all over Germany as well as in Portugal. But is the "where" really crucial? Creativity knows no boundaries anyway. That's why we don't want to set any. We only create the environment in which you can create - along our four corporate values: Courage, Mindfulness, Collaboration and Impact. Short introduction At our company, you will find a colorful mix of different characters. We are divided into three areas: recruiting, people relations & development and services. This allows us to guarantee comprehensive support from the receipt of applications to the further development of employees. 2 jobs available People & Organisation

LET US DISCOVER YOU. Every person is unique. That is why we do not think in categories or roles. We are looking for people who are enthusiastic about new tasks, who share our values and have courage. For many of our employees we try to define a role that fits their expectations and demands – but of course also fits into the overall picture of diconium. True to the motto: "Create your very own job with us". IN OTHER WORDS: IF OUR VACANCIES DO NOT EXACTLY FIT YOU, THEY WILL BE MADE SUITABLE. All you have to do is send us your application. Tell us about yourself, what you can do, what expectations you have, what you are enthusiastic about. We will then take care of the details. Just send us your documents and we will see which team suits your skills and interests best. We will get in touch with you! one job available Proactive Application

Mit Eintragung Ihrer E-Mailadresse willigen Sie darin ein, dass diconium Ihnen Informationen zu Dienstleistungen, Produkten und Job-Angeboten des Unternehmens sowie zu Neuerungen und Veränderungen des Unternehmens und der IT-Branche per E-Mail zusenden darf. Die Einwilligung gilt erst als erteilt, wenn Sie im Rahmen eines Double-Opt-in-Verfahrens Ihre E-Mailadresse verifiziert und die Einwilligung bestätigt haben. Sie können die Einwilligung jederzeit widerrufen oder einen Werbewiderspruch einlegen, indem Sie in den Newslettern den Abmeldelink verwenden oder indem Sie sich an die im Impressum angegebenen Kontaktmöglichkeiten wenden. Näheres zur Datenverarbeitung und zu den Informationspflichten finden Sie in unserer Datenschutzerklärung. Die datengetriebene End-to-End Wertschöpfung eröffnet Chancen für Ihr Angebot und Ihr Unternehmensmanagement: Daten-Architekturen und Methoden der Künstlichen Intelligenz revolutionieren personalisierte Anwendungen, interaktive Assistenten erschaffen neue Kundenerlebnisse und die Echtzeit-Anbindung von intelligenten IoT Devices steigern die Effizienz in Distributions- und Wertschöpfungsketten. In jedem Ihrer Unternehmensprozesse werden Daten während des Prozessablaufs in Legacy Systemen sowie über die Nutzung von IoT Devices erzeugt und verarbeitet. Diese Daten werden mit den datenanalytischen Verhaltensmustern anonymisierter User kombiniert und über die Instrumente Process- & Data Mining sowie Machine Learning in Echtzeit automatisiert. Wir unterstützen Sie als Masterclass Partner von Celonis dabei, diese Potentiale für Ihr Unternehmensergebnis, für die Optimierung Ihrer intelligenten Produkt- und Serviceangebote und für die Effizienzsteigerung Ihrer Time-to-Market Prozesse zu heben. Die stufenweise Integration eigener Datensensoren aus Web, Mobile und IoT-Anwendungen sowie die parallele Anbindung von Drittdatenquellen helfen Ihnen bei der Umsetzung lernender Agenten mit Machine- und Deep-Learning Algorithmen.Supervised, unsupervised und Reinforcement Learning Methoden ermöglichen Ihnen, prädiktiv und automatisiert, Ihre Produkte, Ihre Produktionsmittel und die betroffenen Unternehmensprozesse instand zu halten. Hierbei ist unser P.E.A.S. (Performance – Environment – Actuators – Sensors) Framework die Grundlage für die produktive Gestaltung von AI-Applikationen. Welches Businessziel der Agent leisten soll (Performance), in welchem Umfeld dies zu erreichen ist (Environment), welche Handlungsoption in einem dynamischen Umfeld hierfür erforderlich ist (Actuators) und welche Daten dafür notwendig sind (Sensors), definieren und implementieren wir mit Ihnen gemeinsam. Objekte und deren Eigenschaften in Fotos zu verstehen, ist ein Teilgebiet der Künstlichen Intelligenz. FAQs zum Customer Journey Marketing Was ist eine Customer Journey? Eine Customer Journey beschreibt den typischen Weg, den Kunden von Touchpoint zu Touchpoint gehen. Das Ziel ist eine Conversion wie etwa der Kauf eines Produkts oder der Download von Content. So individuell eine Customer Journey auch ist, sie lässt sich systematisch in 5 Phasen gliedern. Wie lauten die Phasen einer Customer Journey? Phase 1: Aufmerksamkeit Kunden werden auf Ihr Angebot aufmerksam. Die ersten Touchpoints sind zum Beispiel Empfehlungen, Social Media Posts oder Präsentationen im Geschäft. Phase 2: Interesse (Consideration) Der Kunde sucht die beste Lösung für sein Bedürfnis und vergleicht verschiedene Angebote. In dieser Phase kommt es auf Überzeugungsarbeit an. Es gilt, das Interesse zu intensivieren und ihn häufig über die eigenen Touchpoints zu erreichen. Phase 3 Kauf (Acquisition) Der Kunde will das passende Angebot zu einem fairen Preis kaufen und sucht den Kontakt. Dies geschieht etwa per Mail, im Onlineshop oder über eine App. Phase 4: Lieferung und Nutzung Ist der Kauf abgeschlossen, erwartet der Kunde eine rasche Lieferung. Die Qualität muss einwandfrei sein, eventuelle Reklamationen und Rückfragen sollen schnell und kundenfreundlich bearbeitet werden. Die Touchpoints in Phase 4 sind etwa Lieferdienst und Kundendienst. Phase 5: Erinnerung (Loyalty) Zufriedene Kunde möchten positive Erfahrungen erneut erleben und andere darauf aufmerksam machen. Aus Kunden werden Fans. In dieser Phasen können Unternehmen Zusatzverkäufe generieren. Wie macht man eine Customer Journey? Wir definieren eine Buyers Persona, führen eine Wettbewerbsanalyse durch und entwickeln unter Berücksichtigung relevanter Informationen die typische Customer Journey durch einen Sales Funnel. Alle begleitenden Maßnahmen, etwa in den Bereichen Social-Media-Marketing, Content-Marketing oder Online-Werbung werden ergänzt. Wann beginnt die Customer Journey? Die User Journey beginnt am ersten Touchpoint, mit dem Kunden in Kontakt kommen. Dies kann im Bereich des E-Commerce zum Beispiel der Online-Shop oder im Rahmen des E-Mail-Marketings die Bekanntgabe der E-Mail-Adresse zum Download eines E-Books sein. Potentielle Kunden können auch online über Google auf eine Firma oder ein Produkt aufmerksam werden. Was ist eine Customer Journey Map? Die Customer Journey Map ist ein visuelles Hilfsmittel. Sich macht sichtbar, welchen Weg Kunden vom ersten Touchpoint mit dem Unternehmen bis zum Kauf eines Produkts und darüber hinaus nehmen.

Erfolgreiches Customer Experience Design basiert auf den Bedürfnissen und Gewohnheiten der User. diconium zeigt, wie man diese deutet und die erlangten Insights in Design-Entscheidungen übersetzt. So holen wir gemeinsam das Beste aus Ihren digitalen Produkten heraus. Design bedeutet nicht nur: etwas schön machen. Design bedeutet vor allem, ein Produkt so zu gestalten, dass der User es gerne benutzt. Dass er auf Ihrer Website immer sofort findet, was er sucht. Dass er immer wieder auf Ihre App klickt, einfach, weil sie ihm Spaß bringt. Dass er in Ihrem Online Shop einkauft, ohne viel drüber nachzudenken. Gutes Experience Design bringt den User schnell und intuitiv zum Ziel. Wichtig ist, in jeder Situation zu verstehen, was die Needs der User sind. Wer sucht wann nach was? Welches Problem soll gelöst werden? Wenn man das versteht, kann man auf diesen Need reagieren, indem man den User geschickt in die richtige Richtung leitet. Dann muss man die Erwartungen des Users nur noch mit herausragenden Services und Produkten übertreffen. Gemeinsam holen wir das Beste aus Ihren digitalen Produkten heraus. Was wir tun Die Tools, mit denen wir mehrwertstiftende digitale Produkte designen, sind vielfältig. Atomic Design, Responsive Web, Design Thinking, Prototyping, User-Testing, Multi-Channel, Golden Circle: Wir stellen unsere Methoden nach Ihren individuellen Bedürfnissen zusammen. Dann arbeiten wir agil oder im klassischen Wasserfall-Stil mit Ihnen zusammen.

AT A GLANCE Industry: Automotive Business: B2C diconium expertise: App Development, Web Development, Backend Microservice Solutions, UX & UI Design, Test Management & Test Automation Technologies: Mobile (Swift, Flutter, Kotlin), Java/Springboot, React: Contact us Task For the release of an e-car model, diconium was to realize the customer journey around the electric charging of the vehicle for its client. The vision: to be the best charging provider on the market. Driving an e-car would then finally become a matter of course, because the user could find out about charging stations in advance and receive details about providers, locations, connections, etc., as well as pre-plan routes including charging stops. Tight timeframe until the release of the new car model and go-live of the app Parallel development on interdependent third party systems Changing requirements due to parallel business dependencies, e.g. markets and pricing models Realization with all parties involved in the SAFe framework Development of native mobile frontends for iOS and Android as well as a charging backend as a central service hub Development of a public web interface for charging point search and route planning as well as platform integration Development of convenience features such as RFID card ordering or rate selection for public charging Integration of features for controlling and managing wallboxes Connection to service systems of our customer and app integration Write us The charging services were launched in numerous EU markets, and the number of registered users shot up rapidly in the first few months. They all benefit from the wide range of digital functions related to charging, all of which are used via the car manufacturer's app. Web-based route planning rounds off the service. The app shows all available charging points and provides important information on the charging price and availability (free / occupied). In the future, it will also be possible to start and stop the charging process via the app and to display only charging points that are powered by green electricity. The intelligent route planning takes into account both the available charging points and the desired charging strategy. This makes planning easier, especially on longer routes. Users of our client's smart wallboxes for charging at home, receive additional useful online services, such as charging statistics, access management or remote control.

The focus was on barrier-free access for customers, intuitive operation of the individual services and ultimately the generation of sales through added value - while maintaining the corporate identity in all markets and platforms. Bucharest Diconium is a specialist in the fields of data and artificial intelligence. Whether in the areas of search, social and content, personalization and analytics, data engineering or data science - our expertise helps our customers to collect the right data at the right time, to forecast services and offers and thus to make data-driven decisions. Become a part of the diconium data family and support us on our Data & AI journey! Your duties You will build components for a modern, secure and scalable automotive global analytics platform with a data mesh architecture with dozens of standardized modules and 70+ data sources. You will design and implement architectures for a streaming platform and stream processing use cases using AWS technologies. Part of the job will be creating and managing the microservices and storage systems for real-time IoT data. You will also monitor and operate the cloud services for data-based applications conception and implementation as well as expand the CI/CD environment. You are responsible for cloud and container service operations and engineering. You will provide advice to developers on cloud deployment and micro-service architectures as well as CI/CD. Your profile Successfully completed studies in the field of computer science, electrical engineering or comparable studies. Working experience as a Cloud Engineer with proficient know-how in cloud-native technologies (in particular AWS). Experience with Big Data Architecture & design (Redshift, etc.) Solid scripting (e.g., Python, shell) for automation of workflows. Good knowledge of REST, RPCs, APIs and experience in building and deploying software (CI / CD). Knowledge of Microservice Architectures, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform. Our offer Born digital: Benefit from our many years of experience and our agile up-to-date culture Life-Work-Balance: Decide for yourself where and when you work: across locations in the Digital Workspace, part-time, completely flexible, taking a sabbatical – no problem with us. Appreciation: We rely on flat hierarchies and are respectful, loyal and appreciative. Perspectives: We offer very different and individually tailored career models and a steep learning curve. Benefits: In addition to retirement provisions, employee discounts and a wide range of sports activities, we offer great company outings and legendary parties.
